Exaggerate: The claim does not appear to exaggerate any facts or information.
Understate: The claim does not appear to understate any facts or information.
Falters at times: The claim does not appear to falter at any point.
Lack enough support: The claim does not lack support as it is supported by the expert's verdict and information provided.
Problematic assumption: The claim does not make any problematic assumptions.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanations.
